headline: Apollo Names Diego De Giorgi as Incoming Head of EMEA
summary: LONDON and NEW YORK, Feb. 10, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Apollo (NYSE: APO) today announced that industry veteran Diego De Giorgi will join the firm as a Partner and Head of EMEA. De Giorgi will succeed longtime Apollo Partner Rob Seminara in the role, who will remain in the region to support a successful transition before assuming new, global responsibilities for Apollo later this year. De Giorgi has spent more than 30 years in London serving in key leadership positions for large global banks. As

headline: Apollo Expands Wealth Reach And AI Credit Bet With Schroders And xAI
summary: Apollo Global Management (NYSE:APO) has agreed a partnership with Schroders to create hybrid public private market products for wealth and retirement clients. The firm is also a key financier in a multi billion dollar AI chip leasing deal that will supply infrastructure to xAI. These moves expand Apollo's presence in both traditional asset management channels and non traditional lending tied to AI infrastructure. Apollo Global Management comes into these deals with its shares at $133.95 and...
